hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا ابن العلاء، عن وكيع، عن سفيان، عن سهيل، نحوه قال ‏"‏ في الصلاة فليكظم ما استطاع ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted in a similar way by Suhail through a different chain of narrators. This version has; “during prayer, so he should hold as far as possible”.
